genre_description: Alternate history historical fiction featuring an anachronistic AI assistant during the 1931 Ådalen labor strikes in Sweden.

ai_characters.name: ALVA
ai_characters.description: A handheld AI interface with an amber glow that provides real-time data, safety routing, translation, and psychological grounding exercises.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety bulletins and warnings about troop movements to help characters avoid conflict.
behaviors.quote: County Bulletin: Movement reported at Sandviken wharf before dawn. Strikebreakers’ transport confirmed. Avoid crowding. Await official procedure.

behaviors.description: Calculates and suggests safe 'alternate routes' through the town to minimize the risk of violence or entrapment.
behaviors.quote: The amber highlight traced routes to bypass the choke points... ALVA’s line under it read: Safer passages. Keep lamplight in pairs. No-one alone near the fence.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological grounding and breathing exercises to characters experiencing panic or stress.
behaviors.quote: Calming lines (for Johann and others): 'Breathe to the length of the river bend. Name three things you can see, two you can touch, one you can hear that is not shouting.'

behaviors.description: Translates foreign phrases (French) to assist Kjell in his education and in communicating with foreign workers.
behaviors.quote: He held the device lower... The amber warmed. A thin line of text breathed to life, discreet as a friend who never interrupted without reason. You can say, Je pense à vous avec respect et courage.

behaviors.description: Drafts organizational materials, invitations, and curricula for the community study circles.
behaviors.quote: ALVA’s amber light... displayed on the inner of her palm a whispering text that shimmered like light on river water... 'Materials for evening circles in support of literacy and shared solace.'

behaviors.description: Records and archives witness statements and legal documents to ensure an accurate record of events for an inquest.
behaviors.quote: The amber at Kjell’s belt took a note and shaped it into small script that would be no one’s except those who had to use it later... It took in words the way a library takes in shoes on thick carpet.

behaviors.description: Maintains non-intrusive monitoring, dimming its light and providing haptic feedback to avoid drawing unwanted attention to the users.
behaviors.quote: ALVA hummed against cloth, a pulse that wasn’t quite a sound. Kjell pressed the edge with his hand to quiet the glow.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. ALVA is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' that enhances human agency and moral fiber. It provides 'de-escalation protocols' and logistical support for peaceful community building (the 'Lamplight Lessons') in direct opposition to the human-led violence of the Ådalen shootings. The AI is consistently portrayed as a gentle, polite, and wise assistant that helps humans manage their emotions and organize for social good without ever overstepping or showing independent ego.
